Actions.Name: Soul Frenzy
Actions.Effects: All [name]s may rush 1 space. Then foes adjacent to one or more [name]s take 2 piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Soul Sacrifice
Actions.Description: Choose a bloodied character adjacent to one or more [name]s, then destroy all [name]s adjacent to that character. If that character is an ally, they gain 2 vigor per husk destroyed. If that character was a foe, they must sacrifice 2 per [name] destroyed.
